name: Operation Wocao Activity
description: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
false_positives: Administrators that use checkadmin.exe tool to enumerate local administrators
query: process.command_line:(/.*[Cc][Hh][Ee][Cc][Kk][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ 127\.0\.0\.1\ \-[Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Hh]\ [Aa][Dd][Vv][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll]\ [Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll]\ [Aa][Dd][Dd]\ [Rr][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ [Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\=[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\ [Dd][Ii][Rr]\=[Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\ \/[Cc]\ [Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \-[Ee][Pp]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss]\ \-[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ [Cc]\:\\[Ss]\.[Pp][Ss]1.*/ OR /.*\/[Tt][Nn]\ [Ww][Ii][Nn]32[Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Ss]\ \/[Ff].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ [Ww][Ii][Nn]32[Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Ss]\ [Bb][Ii][Nn][Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\=.*/ OR /.*\\[Cc]$\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Ee][Vv][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss]\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc]\ [Jj][Gg][Aa][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Yy][Pp][Ee]\ .*[Kk][Ee][Ee][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss]\\[Kk][Ee][Ee][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg]\.[Xx][Mm][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Ii][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ [Ii][Ii][Ee]\.[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Gg]\ [Qq][Uu][Ee][Rr][Yy]\ [Hh][Kk][Ee][Yy]_[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt]_[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\.*\\[Pp][Uu][Tt][Tt][Yy]\\[Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.command_line:(*checkadmin.exe\ 127.0.0.1\ \-all* OR *netsh\ advfirewall\ firewall\ add\ rule\ name\=powershell\ dir\=in* OR *cmd\ \/c\ powershell.exe\ \-ep\ bypass\ \-file\ c\:\\s.ps1* OR *\/tn\ win32times\ \/f* OR *create\ win32times\ binPath\=* OR *\\c$\\windows\\system32\\devmgr.dll* OR *\ \-exec\ bypass\ \-enc\ JgAg* OR *type\ *keepass\\KeePass.config.xml* OR *iie.exe\ iie.txt* OR *reg\ query\ HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\*\\PuTTY\\Sessions\\*)`
